channel.title: Diversity - [JOIN OUR IRC]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.handbag.com/?module=images&func=display&fileId=102725[/img] [size=15pt][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.com&channel=diversity]JOIN OUR IRC, CLICK HERE![/url][/size]
Hello and welcome to the [b]official[/b] thread of the newest RSPS project, Diversity! I've been thinking recently, what should I do; I had a really successful community last year called TheModerationZone, which I enjoyed running. I managed to get over 200,000 registered members, with atleast 250 on at one time. I had enough money then, and I spent it on vBulletin and a domain name. Now, I don't have much money, as I have a baby boy or girl on the way, so I need all the money I can get at this moment in time. But I've decided to start a new project, Diversity, which will hopefully get a few donations and be pretty much a successful server in a whiles time.
At th moment I'm looking for a very kind person to donate me vBulletin or IPB (no-one will do that) or a kind person to donate £3-9 which I can spend on a domain name. I am also looking for a partner, which could hopefully host & code my server. I can code a little bit, but I'm sure you'll be a better coder than me, so I'd let you do it. That person would be in-charge of the server, but all decisions would have to be run by me before they are made final. I'm also looking for a someone who is an expert in HTML/PHP/etc, which will help out in the forums and give me advice of what to do. [s] 1. Webhost deal created.[/s] [s]2. SMF & myBB downloaded (will choose which I will use later)[/s] 3. Thread made, ready to recruit a development team. [b]4. Donations needed. (PM me if you wish to donate to the project you will get LOTS of benefits)[/b]
[u][b]Current Team[/b][/u] The Team Leader: [b]Tribey[/b] The Team Leader²: Site-Developer: Site-Developer²: Server Hoster/Coder: Server Hoster/Coder²: Graphical Producer: [b]Mike[/b] Graphical Producer²: IRC Operator: IRC Operator²: Super Moderator: Super Moderator²:
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2v2z7vc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/24earfl.png[/img]
[u][s]____________________________________________________________________________________________________[/s][/u]
[u][b]Job Vacancies [/b][/u] [b] Site-Developer[/b] You must have experience in the SMF, and when purchased, vBulletin.. You must also have experience in, Javascript, PHP and HTML, you be asked to add some "unique" parts to the website, if you cannot do them, you will have to make up for it some how.
[b]Graphical Producer[/b] If you apply for this job, you will need to first of all, provide us with a banner that fits the required size. You may then be asked to make forum icons, or a promotional banner to go in the members signatures. Must have Photoshop and have alot of experience. (Prove it)
[b]Server Hoster/Coder[/b] This would be the most important job, evidently. You will need to be able to host the server atleast 15 hours a day. And you will need to have reasonably good coding skills, although I will code the base if you don't have a good one. [b] IRC Operator[/b] You will need to be mature, intelligent and helpful on our IRC channel. If you are active everyday, and I notice it alot; I may reward your valuable time with an IRC rank, which after more activity will increase to the highest rank, 'Protect' (&)
[b]ALL PICTURES AND INFORMATION ON THE SERVER WILL BE POSTED HERE. IF YOU WISH TO JOIN OUR FORUMS, PLEASE CLICK THE LINK IN MY SIGNATURE.[/b][/center]

item.title: Diversity - [JOIN OUR IRC]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You need to get mod/admin permission to post a development thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Diversity - [JOIN OUR IRC]
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

I feel this will go no where.

I see nothing that really relates to the development of the server itself. From what I read, It almost seems you are just using this to get some extra cash. You really don’t set any server goals, but you just say you need a team…

Another note, you don’t ‘code’ Java, you program it.

Read full topic

item.title: Diversity - [JOIN OUR IRC]
item.dc:creator: @boycie-tribey Tribey
item.description:
@boycie-tribey wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:2, topic:294025"][quote author=boycie-tribey link=topic=388974.msg2906935#msg2906935 date=1249855908]
will increase to the highest rank, ‘Protect’ (&)
[/quote]
I lol’d. First of all, (&) isn’t called ‘Protect’, Yes, the command is !protect {Nick} although It’s not named that. (&) is AOP, (!AOP add {Nick}) Known as Administrative operator, or Admin. Second of all, (&) Isn’t the highest rank, (~) is, It is the owner status of the IRC channel (+Q).
That’s beyond the point.

Good luck, I hope your project gets somewhere.[/quote]

Yes, I already know it’s AOP. I find it easier saying Protect, because most people are like “wtf is aop???”.
Second. I will be the only owner on the channel, so that doesn’t need to be said.

Thanks for you support.

Read full topic

item.title: Diversity - [JOIN OUR IRC]
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

boycie-tribey:

will increase to the highest rank, ‘Protect’ (&)

I lol’d. First of all, (&) isn’t called ‘Protect’, Yes, the command is !protect {Nick} although It’s not named that. (&) is AOP, (!AOP add {Nick}) Known as Administrative operator, or Admin. Second of all, (&) Isn’t the highest rank, (~) is, It is the owner status of the IRC channel (+Q).
That’s beyond the point.

Good luck, I hope your project gets somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Diversity - [JOIN OUR IRC]
item.dc:creator: @boycie-tribey Tribey
item.description:
@boycie-tribey wrote:

[center]
[size=15pt]JOIN OUR IRC, CLICK HERE![/size]

Hello and welcome to the official thread of the newest RSPS project, Diversity!
I’ve been thinking recently, what should I do; I had a really successful community last year called TheModerationZone, which I enjoyed running.
I managed to get over 200,000 registered members, with atleast 250 on at one time. I had enough money then, and I spent it on vBulletin and a domain name. Now, I don’t have much money, as I have a baby boy or girl on the way, so I need all the money I can get at this moment in time. But I’ve decided to start a new project, Diversity, which will hopefully get a few donations and be pretty much a successful server in a whiles time.

At th moment I’m looking for a very kind person to donate me vBulletin or IPB (no-one will do that) or a kind person to donate £3-9 which I can spend on a domain name. I am also looking for a partner, which could hopefully host & code my server. I can code a little bit, but I’m sure you’ll be a better coder than me, so I’d let you do it. That person would be in-charge of the server, but all decisions would have to be run by me before they are made final. I’m also looking for a someone who is an expert in HTML/PHP/etc, which will help out in the forums and give me advice of what to do.
[s]

  1. Webhost deal created.[/s]
    2. SMF & myBB downloaded (will choose which I will use later)
  2. Thread made, ready to recruit a development team.
    4. Donations needed. (PM me if you wish to donate to the project you will get LOTS of benefits)

Current Team
The Team Leader: Tribey
The Team Leader²:
Site-Developer:
Site-Developer²:
Server Hoster/Coder:
Server Hoster/Coder²:
Graphical Producer: Mike
Graphical Producer²:
IRC Operator:
IRC Operator²:
Super Moderator:
Super Moderator²:


____________________________________________________________________________________________________

Job Vacancies


Site-Developer
You must have experience in the SMF, and when purchased, vBulletin…
You must also have experience in, Javascript, PHP and HTML, you be asked to add some “unique” parts to the website, if you cannot do them, you will have to make up for it some how.

Graphical Producer
If you apply for this job, you will need to first of all, provide us with a banner that fits the required size. You may then be asked to make forum icons, or a promotional banner to go in the members signatures. Must have Photoshop and have alot of experience. (Prove it)

Server Hoster/Coder
This would be the most important job, evidently. You will need to be able to host the server atleast 15 hours a day. And you will need to have reasonably good coding skills, although I will code the base if you don’t have a good one.

IRC Operator
You will need to be mature, intelligent and helpful on our IRC channel. If you are active everyday, and I notice it alot; I may reward your valuable time with an IRC rank, which after more activity will increase to the highest rank, ‘Protect’ (&)

ALL PICTURES AND INFORMATION ON THE SERVER WILL BE POSTED HERE.
IF YOU WISH TO JOIN OUR FORUMS, PLEASE CLICK THE LINK IN MY SIGNATURE.[/center]

Read full topic
